apprentice.title: Warded Archive Door
apprentice.description: A simple barrier keyed to a 1st-level Abjuration matrix. One sigil is missing.
objectives: Trace the inward spiral flow to identify the absent node
Reconstruct the Component Layer to stable state
hints: Abjuration flows always close at Projection-Range
The missing sigil corresponds to casting interval

apprentice.title: False Echo
apprentice.description: Illusion nodes flicker out of sequence as the party enters an antechamber.
objectives: Determine whether the flow folds outward or inward
Disrupt the mirrored node before it repeats twice
hints: Illusion pathways cross the central row twice
Watch for recursive indicators in Specialist Layer

journeyman.title: Broken Confluence
journeyman.description: Two overlapping Conjuration matrices compete over a summoning circle.
objectives: Identify which Flow Path resolves first
Use Disruption mode to collapse the unstable branch
hints: Branching outcomes sit in the Specialist Layer's middle row
The later spell uses a longer interval glyph

archmage.title: Antagonistic Weave
archmage.description: A necromantic paradox bleeds into a planar gate, creating recursive death waves.
objectives: Trace the descending Necromancy flow while monitoring recursion
Deploy Counterspell timing before node three completes
Log every Specialist Layer contradiction in the glyph bank
hints: Depth requirement equals twice the hostile matrix level
Recursive nodes glow in alternating pulses
